Exclusive: First look at Apple’s new AirPods-like ‘Powerbeats Pro’ truly wireless sport headphones



Last week, a report suggested that Apple is planning to release a “truly wireless” version of Beats Powerbeats headphones next month. Today’s release of iOS 12.2 includes imagery of the new headphones, which we now know will be called Powerbeats Pro.

Hidden in iOS 12.2 are animations and images that showcase Powerbeats without any sort of connecting wire. In terms of design, they’re nearly identical to Powerbeats3, but truly wireless much like AirPods. The glyphs show Powerbeats Pro in black and white color variations.

Furthermore, iOS 12.2 includes an image of the Powerbeats Pro charging case. This case looks similar to the AirPods case, and will theoretically charge your Powerbeats Pro buds when not in use. Powerbeats3 today offer battery life of up to 12 hours, but it’s unclear if the truly wireless version would be able to match that. The charging case, however, would make it easier for users to charge while on the go.

Powerbeats remain a popular alternative to AirPods due to their more workout-friendly design. There are clips to help each earbud stay in place, as well as different ear tip designs to accommodate different ear sizes and noise cancellation needs.

Last week’s report suggested that the truly wireless Powerbeats 4 will be available sometime next month. The report also mentioned that the new Powerbeats will include the same upgraded H1 chip as the second-generation AirPods, as well as “Hey Siri” support. Powerbeats3 currently retail for $199, but are often available cheaper from third-parties. Pricing for Powerbeats Pro is unclear, but given that iOS 12.2 includes the assets for the new headphones, we’ll likely learn all of the details soon.

We’ve also been able to confirm that the new Powerbeats Pro earphones will support “Hey, Siri”, just like the new AirPods released last week. There’s a user interface in iOS 12.2 that can be used to train “Hey, Siri” for Powerbeats Pro.

Apple rebrands 2015 Apple TV as ‘Apple TV HD’ as it introduces Apple TV+ streaming service

With the introduction of the Apple TV+ original content offering, Apple now has four products that start with the name ‘Apple TV’. Apple TV app, Apple TV+, Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD.

However, the change to the Apple TV box is merely a rebrand. Apple continues to sell both the Apple TV HD and the Apple TV 4K at the classic $149 and $179 price points. It seems weird that Apple does not have a cheaper hardware entry point for the living room, as a vessel for its revamped streaming services offering.

The company did however announce that Amazon Fire TV and Roku devices would be adding the Apple TV app in the future. Perhaps this is Apple’s strategy or maybe hardware updates to the Apple TV product line will arrive by the time the Apple TV+ service launches in the fall.

quote.msg:
Exclusive: First look at Apple’s new AirPods-like ‘Powerbeats Pro’ truly wireless sport headphones



Last week, a report suggested that Apple is planning to release a “truly wireless” version of Beats Powerbeats headphones next month. Today’s release of iOS 12.2 includes imagery of the new headphones, which we now know will be called Powerbeats Pro.

Hidden in iOS 12.2 are animations and images that showcase Powerbeats without any sort of connecting wire. In terms of design, they’re nearly identical to Powerbeats3, but truly wireless much like AirPods. The glyphs show Powerbeats Pro in black and white color variations.

Furthermore, iOS 12.2 includes an image of the Powerbeats Pro charging case. This case looks similar to the AirPods case, and will theoretically charge your Powerbeats Pro buds when not in use. Powerbeats3 today offer battery life of up to 12 hours, but it’s unclear if the truly wireless version would be able to match that. The charging case, however, would make it easier for users to charge while on the go.

Powerbeats remain a popular alternative to AirPods due to their more workout-friendly design. There are clips to help each earbud stay in place, as well as different ear tip designs to accommodate different ear sizes and noise cancellation needs.

Last week’s report suggested that the truly wireless Powerbeats 4 will be available sometime next month. The report also mentioned that the new Powerbeats will include the same upgraded H1 chip as the second-generation AirPods, as well as “Hey Siri” support. Powerbeats3 currently retail for $199, but are often available cheaper from third-parties. Pricing for Powerbeats Pro is unclear, but given that iOS 12.2 includes the assets for the new headphones, we’ll likely learn all of the details soon.

We’ve also been able to confirm that the new Powerbeats Pro earphones will support “Hey, Siri”, just like the new AirPods released last week. There’s a user interface in iOS 12.2 that can be used to train “Hey, Siri” for Powerbeats Pro.

iOS 12.2更新中已經出現了Powerbeats Pro的圖像，而這款產品正是Beats品牌即將推出的全新產品，跟新款AirPods相近，但同時間，應該更強大，目前Beats品牌的無線耳機，最細小的，都是掛頸式的設計，有 8 小時使用時間，不過不能像 AirPods 一般隨時充電，而新設計正正就加入了 AirPods 的充電優點


從圖片上看，新款PowerBeats使用真正的無線設計，掛耳式也耳架會更為穩固，Powerbeats 耳機相信會比目前的 AirPods 有更好的低音效果，更有機會加入放水的特點，售價相信要到正式發售時才會正式公開的，不過可以推測與 AirPods 價錢相近或更高

iOS 12.2更新中已經出現了Powerbeats Pro的圖像，而這款產品正是Beats品牌即將推出的全新產品，跟新款AirPods相近，但同時間，應該更強大，目前Beats品牌的無線耳機，最細小的，都是掛頸式的設計，有 8 小時使用時間，不過不能像 AirPods 一般隨時充電，而新設計正正就加入了 AirPods 的充電優點


從圖片上看，新款PowerBeats使用真正的無線設計，掛耳式也耳架會更為穩固，Powerbeats 耳機相信會比目前的 AirPods 有更好的低音效果，更有機會加入放水的特點，售價相信要到正式發售時才會正式公開的，不過可以推測與 AirPods 價錢相近或更高

Apple又想做到超多線圈+official apple watch叉座咁薄

https://mrmad.com.tw/airpower-plan-to-stop

2018 年 12月美國專利商標局公布蘋果 AirPower 專利說明書，從報告中顯示，AirPower 主打可同時替 iPhone 、 Apple Watch 和 AirPods（二代） 充電，並且能夠辨識目前正在替哪些設備充電，會將充電狀態顯示於最大款螢幕設備上。

此外 AirPower 還會分析 iPhone 用戶資料，像是行事曆、App 耗電資訊、使用習慣等，甚至還會分析剩餘電量可否足夠撐到下回充電，當電量告急時，會藉由 iPhone 震動或聲音提醒用戶。

不過想要讓多款設備都能夠在每個充電板每個角落上都可充電，那就需要塞入多個線圈；但光一個線圈就會導致無線充電盤和手機背面發熱，如果有更多的線圈，也會導致 AirPower 充電板面臨過熱和干擾問題。

後續有位來自供應商和碩組裝 AirPods 爆料者指出，和碩計劃在 21 日開始進行量產，老外很急，我是組裝 AirPods 線圈的，這個產品沒太大作用，一塊無線充電板內，裡面共有 22 個線圈，並疊成3層，每一層會有8個，第2、3層則是各7個。

華爾街日報也透過知情人士指出，原本 AirPower 的確是準備要進行生產，但是蘋果發現到生產成本太高後直接被取消，另一個原因是當 AirPower 充電時發熱，會導致無法讓每款設備繼續充電，其中 Apple Watch 影響最嚴重。

Techcrunch 也同樣指出，關於 AirPower 會導致延遲推出，主要涉及到 多線圈設計問題，導致 AirPower 最終都還是沒辦法能解決過熱問題，甚至有工程師看過 AirPower 設計後，表示這是不可能工作，要解決無線充電「發熱的問題幾乎很難」，除非要重新採用其他不同設計或是直接放棄這計劃，蘋果最終還是選擇了後者，停止 AirPower 計畫
